name: Edward A. KREUTZER, et al., Respondents, v. MONTEREY COUNTY HERALD CO., f/k/a Pittsburgh Press Co., Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Kreutzer v. Monterey County Herald Co.

parties: Edward A. KREUTZER, et al., Respondents, v. MONTEREY COUNTY HERALD CO., f/k/a Pittsburgh Press Co., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of April 1999, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John A. McCreary, Jr., Pittsburgh, Ernest E. Vargo, Cleveland, OH, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
727 A.2d 1108
Edward A. KREUTZER, et al., Respondents, v. MONTEREY COUNTY HERALD CO., f/k/a Pittsburgh Press Co., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 13, 1999.
John A. McCreary, Jr., Pittsburgh, Ernest E. Vargo, Cleveland, OH, for petitioner.
